title: Most popular leisure activities among adults in the U.S. 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 10 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Watch TV and lowest at Response Gardening.
There is a difference of 35.0 between the maximum Response Watch TV and minimum Response Gardening.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 42.0 is found at Response Watch TV and the minimum is found at Gardening where Response is 7.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 10 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Watch TV and lowest at Response Gardening.
There is a difference of 35.0 between the maximum Response Watch TV and minimum Response Gardening.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Watch TV and lowest at Response Gardening.
Response Reading has the second highest value for Share of respondents.
Response Watch TV has 6.0 times more Share of respondents than Response Gardening which is has the lowest.
Response Watch TV is higher than any other Responses with value 42.0, followed by Reading, and Computer/internet. Down to Response Gardening with the lowest value 7.0.
Response Exercise/working out, and Playing video games and computer/internet games have the same Share of respondents.
The highest value 42.0 at Watch TV is almost 2.49 times larger than the average value 16.9.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 169.0.

data.Response: Spending time with family and friends
Playing video games and computer/internet games
